term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - biosphere in atmospheric chemistry
term.title: biosphere

item.text: That part of the globe that encompasses all forms of life on the earth. It extends from the ocean depths to a few thousand metres of altitude in the atmosphere, and includes life forms at the earth's surface, in soils and constituents which exchange materials with atmospheres, oceans or surfaces.
